Exaor Maroon Men Kurta - DC-082-3485:
Designed for special occasions this maroon kurta from Exaor will bring out the fashionable side of you. Having a soft fabric with a silky sheen this full-sleeved kurta is comfortable to wear and looks classy. The neckline of this kurta is embellished with an intricately-designed border which is eye-catching in appeal. Wear this traditional kurta from Exaor above white pyjamas and kolhapuris for attending a festive occasion in style.

Exaor Cream Men Kurta 
For men who have a rich and refined taste in fashion this cream coloured kurta from Exaor will be a great pick. This kurta has full length sleeves and a V-shaped neckline both of which are embellished with a broad border. A self-print pattern on the base of this kurta lends it an eye-catching appeal. The fabric of this kurta is soft and lightweight which would keep you comfortable and at ease. Team up this Exaor kurta with matching bottoms and mojris for getting an ethic attire.

Exaor Red and Cream Sherwani - DC086-6:
Attending your best friend's wedding and confused what to wear? Take a look at this sherwani from Exaor which will be a perfect pick for such an occasion. This sherwani comprises a brick red coloured kurta and cream coloured churidars that form a great combination.
